model.name: openApi
model.title: Open Api
model.description: To use OpenApi as contract-first with Camel Rest DSL.
model.label: rest

id.description: Sets the id of this node

note.description: Sets the note of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node

disabled.label: advanced
disabled.description: Whether to disable all the REST services from the OpenAPI contract from the route during build time. Once an REST service has been disabled then it cannot be enabled later at runtime.

specification.description: Path to the OpenApi specification file.

apiContextPath.description: Whether to enable api-doc that exposes the OpenAPI specification file as a REST endpoint. This allows clients to obtain the specification from the running Camel application.

routeId.description: Sets the id of the route

missingOperation.description: Whether to fail, ignore or return a mock response for OpenAPI operations that are not mapped to a corresponding route.

mockIncludePattern.label: advanced
mockIncludePattern.description: Used for inclusive filtering of mock data from directories. The pattern is using Ant-path style pattern. Multiple patterns can be specified separated by comma.
